name: Boiled Periwinkles with Seaweed
description: [Photograph: Chichi Wang] Though you'll spend many a happy hour gathered around the table with loved ones eating these critters, they take very little time to cook in the kitchen. Stir-fry them with your choice of condiments (think soy sauce,...

recipeInstructions.text: Place periwinkles in large bowl and cover with cold water. Agitate gently to rinse. Sand and sediment should fall to bottom of bowl. Lift periwinkles and place in second bowl. Pour off water from first bowl along with sand and sediment. Repeat 3-4 times until no sand rinses off of periwinkles.

In a large stockpot or Dutch oven, bring 4 quarts of water to a rolling boil over high heat. Add cleaned periwinkles and kombu. Simmer 20 minutes, then drain. Serve hot or cold with soy sauce, lemon, and/or olive oil.
